items.titolo: Two Thinking Machines Lab Cofounders Are Leaving to Rejoin OpenAI
items.descrizione: The departures are a blow for Thinking Machines Lab. Two narratives are already emerging about why they happened.

items.titolo: No Matter? No problem! Imagine one smart home app to control all your devices
items.descrizione: Unveiled at CES, the new Copilot Star platform is designed to take smart device interoperability to the next level.

items.titolo: Gemini arriva su Google Trends, addio ricerche manuali infinite

items.titolo: Qwen boss says Chinese AI models have 'less than 20%' chance of leapfrogging Western counterparts — despite China's $1 billion AI IPO week, capital can't close the gap alone
items.descrizione: China’s AI sector made a splash this month as a cluster of domestic AI firms raised more than $1 billion through IPOs in Hong Kong.
